org.goldenorb.zookeeper
Class LeaderGroup<MEMBER_TYPE extends Member>

java.lang.Object
  org.goldenorb.zookeeper.LeaderGroup<MEMBER_TYPE>
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrbConfigurable
public class LeaderGroup<MEMBER_TYPE extends Member>
extends Object
implements OrbConfigurable

This class defines LeaderGroup, which forms the abstract structure used to coordinate between members.

Nested Class Summary
 class LeaderGroup.MemberDataWatcher
          This class defines a Watch for use with the data in each member.
